comments:

1. in the Breakpoints view click 'Add Java Exception Breakpoint'
2. type I
==>NPE

!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.jobs 4 2 2007-03-23 11:27:13.787
!MESSAGE An internal error occurred during: "Items filtering".

This bug makes it hard to add Java breakpoints.
Note that you need to wait until the full list is populated - this doesn't happen which the list is being built.
As this is so easy to get we should fix it for M6.
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 178795 ***

Created an attachment (id=61804)
Patch fixes this problem
Krystof the patch should go to Bug 178980
Note: the words "Returns name for then given object." in the javadoc is not valid English.
